RCS2 032727-132623.Notes: This Hubble image shows one of the most striking examples of gravitational lensing, a nearly 90-degree arc of light in the galaxy cluster "RCS2 032727-132623". (RCS = Red-sequence Cluster Survey) Hubble's view of the distant background galaxy, which lies nearly 10 billion light-years away, is significantly more detailed than could be achieved without the help of the gravitational lens.
